cur.name: Steamtools
cur.text:
A service that provides free to paid fools for the Application Steam, from having your account ran on our servers to retrieving statistics.
Homepage will be rebuilt by me soon!

cur.name: Stera
cur.text: A service that automatically uploads Shadowplay clips straight to the internet, making it easy and simple to share it with friends or to store clips!

old.name: Dustie
old.text: A Discord bot that got me into coding! However, it didn't last long as I ended up resigning ownership of it and transfer it to someone else.

old.name: PV Worker
old.text: A PWA (Mobile App), for the employees of a polish solar company, that allows them manage their installations for clients.
